blogPost.excerpt:
Kevin James is an actor whose career in comedy touches everything from stand-up to massively successful TV shows and films. He also stars in The Crew, a comedy series set to release on Netflix February 15th. And check out the Kevin James YouTube channel as it quickly approaches one million subscribers. But how is he with spicy food? Find out as the King of Queens tries to become the King of Hot Sauce while talking about everything from UFC fandom, to Hitch lore, to the preeminence of Long Island pizza.

localize.title: 凯文-詹姆斯在吃辣子鸡翅的时候忘记了自己是谁|Hot Ones
localize.description:
凯文-詹姆斯是一名演员，他的喜剧生涯触及从脱口秀到大获成功的电视节目和电影。他还出演了《船员》（The Crew），这部喜剧系列将于2月15日在Netflix上映。并查看凯文-詹姆斯的YouTube频道，因为它迅速接近100万订阅者。但他对辛辣食物的态度如何？皇后区之王试图成为辣酱之王，同时谈论从终极格斗锦标赛（UFC）的影迷，到希奇的传说，再到长岛披萨的卓越地位，一起来看看吧。

捐献给HOT ONES的全新慈善伙伴--COMMON THREADS，让你的生活更有意义：https://www.commonthreads.org/firstwefeast/。

localize.title: 凱文-詹姆斯在喫辣子雞翅的時候忘記了自己是誰|Hot Ones

previous.excerpt:
RAW VIDEO: Aerial footage of deadly pileup crash in Fort Worth, Texas involving 75 to 100 vehicles

Officials estimate as many as 100 vehicles were involved in a pileup crash in Fort Worth on I-35W early Thursday morning. Multiple people died, police said, and dozens had to be taken to local hospitals for treatment. 

More details: https://bit.ly/3adIofe
Subscribe to WFAA: https://bit.ly/subscribetowfaa​​​
For news anytime: https://www.wfaa.com/
previous.title: RAW: Aerial footage of deadly pileup crash in Fort Worth, Texas involving up to 100 vehicles

localize.title: RAW：航拍德克萨斯州沃斯堡致命的堆积车祸，涉及多达100辆车。
localize.description:
RAW视频： 德州沃斯堡发生的致命车祸航拍画面 涉及75至100辆车

据官方估计，周四清晨，沃斯堡I-35W公路上发生了多达100辆车的堆积车祸。警方表示，多人死亡，数十人不得不被送往当地医院治疗。

更多详情：https://bit.ly/3adIofe
订阅WFAA：https://bit.ly/subscribetowfaa
随时查看新闻：https://www.wfaa.com/

localize.title: RAW：航拍德克薩斯州沃斯堡致命的堆積車禍，涉及多達100輛車。
localize.description:
RAW視頻： 德州沃斯堡發生的致命車禍航拍畫面 涉及75至100輛車

據官方估計，週四清晨，沃斯堡I-35W公路上發生了多達100輛車的堆積車禍。警方表示，多人死亡，數十人不得不被送往當地醫院治療。

更多詳情：https://bit.ly/3adIofe
訂閱WFAA：https://bit.ly/subscribetowfaa
隨時查看新聞：https://www.wfaa.com/
